name: Spring Watch
description:
It is almost springtime. But winter doesn't want to let go. Protect the precious Sakura tree from the winter spirits, and wait for spring to come.

It is a tower defence game created in 30 hours, with a given theme "Strategy". It was inspired by The Battle Cats (2016), Okapi (2006), Tengami (2014) and the Japanese Cherry Blossom Festival in San Francisco.

Instruction: Left Click to select.
